beats.text: ‘Easy... easy. Watch your step. You see how it stands? No branches? No leaves?’’ |VS| $hero_name leans in close, nostrils flaring while picking up a new page. |VS| ‘Sniff... Sniff... Puh. It smells of rain and old coins. It is a trap made of iron.’
‘Gah! Cold! Look at it—this pole next to the $avatar_amenity on $avatar_street street ... it is hard as stone but smooth as water. Only Men make things this straight.’
‘I don't like it. It makes my fur stand up.’ Whispered $hero_name close to your ear. ‘We are getting too close to the village. Check the ground for another page. Move.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 15  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
